description:
Shaiapouf (シャウアプフ), also known as "Pouf" (プフ), is a butterfly-humanoid Chimera Ant and one of the Royal Guards. He is the most cunning of the three, though his temperament and love for Meruem causes him to covertly defy the King`s orders in order to prevent his humanization. Having wholeheartedly devoted himself to protect Meruem while seeing humans as inferior.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shaiapouf
